name: Serial
headline: Root cause manufacturing issues in seconds
description:
Serial is software to help manufacturers root cause problems in minutes not days and avoid millions in liabilities. Our solution integrates with data sources from any production line, enabling engineering & operations teams to ask questions about their manufacturing data and instantly get answers. Serial will become the single source of truth for manufacturing data.

Our founding team has 10+ years of manufacturing and product design experience from Apple, Tesla, and more. We have suffered this problem firsthand and are building the tool to fix it.

founders.name: Tak Alguire, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO of Serial (W23). Tak has spent the past 5 years in manufacturing operations at companies such as Apple, North, and Fleetcarma. He has firsthand experience deploying large-scale data tools for the iPhone and Apple Watch to empower engineers to make data-driven decisions. Now he wants to help all engineers save time and effort.

founders.name: Devon Copeland, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CTO of Serial (W23). Devon has spent over 5 years working in hardware engineering at companies like Apple, Tesla, and Aeryon Labs. His obsession with timely, data-driven decision making has guided the engineering of several features on Apple Watch Ultra and the Model 3. Today, Devon is laser-focused on bringing his wealth of analytical engineering knowledge to Serial, thereby unlocking new cheat codes for any company making physical products.

## Solve issues in minutes not days
Eliminate the headache of sifting through travelers, excel, and matlab to find your answers. 
#### Manufacturing Flow Chart
Visualize your manufacturing flow from components through final assembly
![process flow chart screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/647a1b39c8a1482e87154576/667c4ea8caa71147491b493d_Screenshot%202024-06-26%20at%2010.23.45%20AM.png)
#### As-built BOM
Track the entire as-Built data structure 
![genealogy screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/647a1b39c8a1482e87154576/666c74ce5cb23aec0bd2d00e_Screenshot%202024-06-14%20at%209.50.17%20AM.png)
#### Instant analysis
Jump straight to comparisons and graphs, never deal with excel again 
![grid builder screenshot
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/647a1b39c8a1482e87154576/666caa1931303a4c356a6cef_Screenshot%202024-06-14%20at%201.37.31%20PM.png)
#### Automated reporting
Instantly review test results for specific serial numbers 
![test details screenshot
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/647a1b39c8a1482e87154576/666c65843636e4b2f97cae00_Screenshot%202024-06-14%20at%208.45.04%20AM.png)
#### Dynamic Work Instructions
Customize your work instructions by part number
![work instructions on iPad
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/647a1b39c8a1482e87154576/667c5209c10f351be265dc94_Frame%2022.png)
#### Mobile Support
Access your data from anywhere
![snlookup iphone
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/647a1b39c8a1482e87154576/667c7f0e5903699fb6559560_snlookup_iphone.png)
#### API support
Upload directly from your testers
![python quick start](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/647a1b39c8a1482e87154576/667c4f7b74320a072763a25b_image%2029.png)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Serial**

Founded in 2023 and based in San Francisco, Serial is shaking up the manufacturing landscape with a bold mission: to help manufacturers pinpoint root causes of issues in seconds rather than days, ultimately shielding them from millions in liabilities. Think of it as a smarter, faster way for engineering and operations teams to dig into their production data, ask the hard questions, and get instant answers.

At its core, Serial is a software platform designed to integrate seamlessly with various data sources along any production line. It aims to serve as the single source of truth for all manufacturing data, making it easier for teams to track every detail—from components to final assembly. 

The founding team brings over a decade of experience from industry giants like Apple and Tesla, so they understand these problems firsthand. They are not just creating another tool; they are crafting a solution they wish they had while navigating the complexities of manufacturing.

The platform includes features such as:
- **Instant Analysis**: Skip the Excel headaches and dive straight into insightful graphs and comparisons.
- **Automated Reporting**: Review test results for specific serial numbers in a snap.
- **Dynamic Work Instructions**: Customize instructions based on part numbers for clarity and efficiency.
- **Trend Alerts**: Catch potential issues before they escalate by proactively monitoring trends.
- **Mobile Access**: Because data should never be restricted to a desk.

Supported by Y Combinator in their W23 batch, Serial operates with a lean two-person team, guided by the expertise of Aaron Epstein as Group Partner. Their strong backing and unique insights into manufacturing challenges position them as an exciting startup in the SaaS and analytics spaces, carving out a niche in the Bay Area.

For more information, schedule a demo, or just get a better sense of what Serial can do, check out their website: [Serial.io](https://www.serial.io/). 

In a world where manufacturing efficiency can make or break a company, Serial is stepping in to change the game—one answer at a time.
